publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4224 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Stenhousemuir Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stenhousemuir Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish League division two; notes the hard work of John Coughlin and his players over the past season to secure promotion, and wishes them well in the 2009-10 season.

S3M-4224 Congratulations to Stenhousemuir Football Club (lodged on 26 May 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Cathy Peattie*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Stewart Maxwell*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-4224 Congratulations to Stenhousemuir Football Club (lodged on 26 May 2009) Hugh Henry*, Sandra White*, Aileen Campbell*

S3M-4224 Michael Matheson: Congratulations to Stenhousemuir Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Stenhousemuir Football Club on its promotion to the Scottish League division two; notes the hard work of John Coughlin and his players over the past season to secure promotion, and wishes them well in the 2009-10 season. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Cathy Peattie, Stuart McMillan, Alasdair Allan, Bill Kidd, Gil Paterson, Jamie McGrigor, Stewart Maxwell, Kenneth Gibson, Hugh Henry, Sandra White, Aileen Campbell
S3M-4224 Congratulations to Stenhousemuir Football Club (lodged on 26 May 2009) Helen Eadie*
